DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Sperm Parameters Men With Secondary Hypogonadism Previously Treated With Topical Testosterone
DOC.detailed_description: The study design determine Androxal® would affect sperm parameter ( count , concentration , volume ) men secondary hypogonadism previously treat topical testosterone . A maximum twelve subject per group randomize daily treatment Androxal® topical testosterone ( Testim® ) six month . The protocol later amend include treatment group receive Androxal 3 month wash period .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male 21 60 year age diagnose AIHH . Subjects must treat topical testosterone replacement therapy ( typically AndroGel® Testim® ) least 6 month enrollment 2 year . A history idiopathic infertility due primary hypogonadism , testicular failure , Kallmann 's syndrome infertility condition . Subjects demonstrate clinically significant medical condition render subject infertile marginally fertile AIHH . Men history , know , suspect prostate disease rule prostate biopsy , prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) > 3.6 clinical suspicion current prostate disease . Men hematocrit excess 50 % hemoglobin > 17 g/dl
DOC.keyword: Adult Onset Idiopathic Hypothalamic Hypogonadism ( AIHH )
